description:
I created a password. When I went to login I typed the password correctly and it said I didn't. I tried two times. I went to reset my password and it said that I didn't verify that I am a human even though I did several times.

Too bad too because I was ready to send a payment and even setup an account on Skrill.
summary: Not working. Can't get it to work

description: Unlicensed version worked OK for me, just follow the instructions.
I run subsonic in the past using FREENAS, every-time my NAS failed I had to start allover again, I been running Subsonic for the past six month without any single issue to report. just love it.

This application failed to start because it could not find or load the Qt platform plugin "wayland-egl"
in "".

Available platform plugins are: eglfs, linuxfb, minimal, minimalegl, offscreen, vnc, xcb.
Does not work, can not even find it after installation

Struggling to get this to read from a removable. I set removable media in the snap store permissions (which btw also allow it to read my home folder)
Could be good if I could get it to work
it's a trial, and you must pay to enjoy it's full features which are quite useful.
After a mad search this guy really fits the bill....in house server and can be accessed from anywhere outside of home network. The $1 a month upgrade is worth it all day!

La importancia de las reseñas es saber que tanto sirve,funciona, un programa o app, y en este caso me doy cuenta de lo útil que son, ya que uno solo quiere comprobarlo al instalar por si mismo el programa y te das cuanta de que tanta verdad guardan las reseñas, algunos solo las detestan, pero deberían de escribir sobre ellas y enfatizar el problema.
Aparece un recuadro negro en donde menciona que es una Snap y después de eso nada.
